contentrichtext.text: {{Starbox begin | name=Q Centauri A/B }} {{Starbox observe | epoch = J2000.0 | constell = [[Centaurus]] | ra = {{RA|13|41|44.772}}<ref name="van Leeuwen2007"/> | dec = {{DEC|−54|33|33.93}}<ref name="van Leeuwen2007"/> | appmag_v = +4.99 (+5.7/+7.1) }} {{Starbox character | class = B8Vn/A0V | b-v = −0.05 | u-b = −0.23 | variable = none }} {{Starbox astrometry | radial_v = +10 | prop_mo_ra = -42.33 ± 0.60<ref name="van Leeuwen2007"/> | prop_mo_dec = -24.26 ± 0.53<ref name="van Leeuwen2007"/> | parallax = 12.02 | p_error = 0.69 | parallax_footnote = <ref name="van Leeuwen2007"/> | absmag_v = +0.39 (+1.1/+2.5) }} {{Starbox catalog | names = [[Harvard Revised catalogue|HR]] 5141, [[Henry Draper Catalogue|HD]] 118991, [[Durchmusterung|CP]]−53°5725, [[Hipparcos catalogue|HIP]] 66821, [[Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory catalogue|SAO]] 241076, GC 18495, CCDM J13417-5434}} {{Starbox reference | Simbad = HD+118991 }} {{Starbox end}} '''Q Centauri''' (Q Cen) is a [[binary star]] in the [[constellation]] [[Centaurus]]. It has a combined [[apparent magnitude]] of +4.99 and is approximately 270 [[light year]]s from [[Earth]]. The primary component, '''Q Centauri A''', is a blue-white [[stellar classification|B-type]] [[main sequence|main sequence dwarf]] with an [[apparent magnitude]] of +5.7. Its companion, '''Q Centauri B''', is a white [[stellar classification|A-type]] main sequence dwarf with an apparent magnitude of +7.1. The two stars are separated by 5.5 [[arcsecond]]s on the sky. == References == {{Reflist|colwidth=30em|refs= <ref name="van Leeuwen2007">{{cite journal | title=Validation of the new Hipparcos reduction | url=http://www.aanda.org/index.php?option=com_article&access=bibcode&Itemid=129&bibcode=2007A%2526A...474..653VFUL | last1=van Leeuwen | first1=F. | journal=Astronomy and Astrophysics | volume=474 | issue=2 | pages=653–664 | year=2007 | arxiv=0708.1752 | bibcode=2007A&A...474..653V | doi=10.1051/0004-6361:20078357 }} [http://webviz.u-strasbg.fr/viz-bin/VizieR-5?-out.add=.&-source=I/311/hip2&recno=66594 Vizier catalog entry ]</ref> }} {{Stars of Centaurus}} [[Category:Bayer objects|Centauri, Q]] [[Category:Binary stars]] [[Category:B-type main-sequence stars]] [[Category:A-type main-sequence stars]] [[Category:Centaurus (constellation)]] {{Multi-star-stub}}
